title: Sri Lanka beats New Zealand by 3 wickets
content: DAMBULLA, Sri Lanka (AP)—Sri Lanka has beaten New Zealand by three wickets with nine overs to spare in the second tri-series one-day international at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium on Friday. After restricting New Zealand to 192 in less than 49 overs, Sri Lanka cruised to victory with 195-7 in the 41st over….
